snippet: The American military agreed to give the Afghan government details of its drug smuggling accusations against Kam Air, after days of Afghan criticism.
abstract: American military lifts at least for moment decision to blacklist Kam Air, one of Afghanistan's main airlines, on suspicion of drug smuggling and agrees to share details of its accusations with Afghan government.
lead_paragraph: The American military agreed to give the Afghan government details of its drug smuggling accusations against Kam Air, after days of Afghan criticism.

headline.seo: Afghan Airline, Kam Air, No Longer Under U.S. Ban
headline.main: U.S. Military Suspends Ban on Afghan Airline
headline.print_headline: U.S. Military Suspends Ban on Afghan Airline

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
